articles.description: Text messages between Android and iPhones, however, are still vulnerable to eavesdropping.
articles.content:
Key Takeaways
  • Google is making RCS messages end-to-end encrypted, bringing its security and privacy on par with popular messaging apps like WhatsApp and iMessage.
